↳ In-reply-to ¬ª So I think the PR to add support for Twtxt to Mastodon is probably not going to happen by the looks of it üò¢ But OTOH I discovered / found out that Mastodon actually has RSS feeds? Can anyone confirm? How does this work? ü§î

@eaplmx Yes but that won‚Äôt matter as the Feeds service will basically poll the RSS feed and track it over time writing new Twts into the Twtxt feed üëå ‚Äì This would already work as-is if you just shove in the .rss URI, but I‚Äôm going to add first-class support for this with something like: mastodon:user@server
